p: Several filgrastim products have been developed since the approval of the original product. In the European Union, starting from 2008, 9 filgrastim biosimilars were approved and 7 products are currently in use. 7 In the USA, Sandoz Inc. (Princeton, NJ, USA) got approval of Zarxio Â®, which was the first biosimilar product passed through the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA) biosimilar approval pathway. 8 In 2017, it is still the only biosimilar filgrastim product available in USA.
